Class bad_polymorphic_get

boost::bad_polymorphic_get — The exception thrown in the event of a failed application of boost::polymorphic_get on the given operand value.

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/variant/polymorphic_get.hpp>


class bad_polymorphic_get : public boost::bad_get {
public:
  virtual const char * what() const;
};

Description

virtual const char * what() const;
